summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5998 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 15, Ladd's Second Addition to South Seattle, being the alley between 11th Avenue South and 12th Avenue South from Snoqualmie Street to the southwesterly line of the City of Seattle Transmission Line right-of-way; and certain other alleys, streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 80409, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
